descriptions:
Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths

Bring classic holiday charm to every corner of your home with this complete 5-piece decor set. Lush, lifelike greenery, warm LED lights, and festive accents make it easy to create a cohesive Christmas look across doors, mantels, railings, and more.

What’s included
- 1 lighted wreath (17.72 in diameter)
- 2 lighted garlands (each 106 in L x 10 in D; approx. 315 branch tips)
- 2 red poinsettia bows (approx. 23.6 in W x 13.8 in H)
- 1 metal hanger

Design and materials
- Realistic greenery: Crafted from durable PE synthetic fir for a full, fresh-cut look.
- Warm ambiance: Integrated warm yellow LED lights on wreath and garlands.
- Festive accents: Wreath embellished with natural-look pine cones and red berries; bright red bows add a classic finishing touch.
- Battery powered: Convenient, cord-free placement (batteries not included).

Versatile decorating
- Perfect for front doors, mantels, fireplaces, stair rails, porches, cabinets, shelves, and Christmas trees.
- Ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties.

Why you’ll love it
- Cohesive set makes decorating fast and beautiful.
- Full, dense branches with 315 tips per garland create impact.
- Warm LEDs deliver a welcoming holiday glow without messy cords.
- Durable materials designed for season-after-season use.

Create a festive focal point at your entry with the wreath and bow, drape the matching garlands along your mantel or staircase, and finish the look with the included hanger for easy setup. Elevate your holiday decor with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths and enjoy a warm, elegant Christmas atmosphere throughout your space.
